segments.text: Looking at this kitchen drawing, it's full of everyday details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand, drying that plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on full blast, water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot in the growing puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry about what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view through the window is so inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Low plants and a fence, a nice spot to relax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting to the center, the boy's climbing the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, maybe to steady or catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, arm up, eagerly waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks precarious, tilted and ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in their little secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between routine and risk is striking here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about potential slips or falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
